posts.content:
Wuzzup D'Alessandro?

Please don't take this the wrong way but, if at all possible, avoid including item enhancements and mythical ability boosts in your progression and calculations. All it does is force those of us trying to compare apples-to-apples to make an additional calculation ourselves to arrive at the TRUE potential rather than one which is contingent on items. Believe me, we can all add the enhancements according to the server we are planning to use it in. 'nuff said about that.

IMO CoT is wasted here. Without decent CHA the real benefits of that PrC class is not being used and durations are worthless (Divine Wrath). So you are sacrificing AB (and AC if those levels were simply placed into more monk levels) for the sake of +6 saves. Not an equitable trade-off in my book. You can gain at least 2 BAB with fewer monk levels pre-epic and more WM. I'd go with a fighter combo if you want both DevCrit & dual-wielding kamas... something like this build that was attempting to hijack an official posting (too bad, because it is MUCH better than the one posted):

Don't know if I would use dwarf myself, would allocate skills differently and would probably sacrifice some AB to get to monk 9 (I wouldn't want to wait until level 40 for IKD!) but it is closer to what I would consider an effective class combo than a CoT/WM. Otherwise, it's decent, though I don't like to design any DevCrit builds myself. True, it has been done and overdone, but there is a reason there not any Monk/CoT/WM builds around.

What I would do (if I were designing this) is decide how much monk speed and AC I am willing to settle for and work backwards. Keep in mind that after +30%, the relative benefits drop like a rock if you factor in haste. 180% vs. 190% vs. 200%, etc. (Without permahaste available, I would consider cleric Travel but that is whole other build). Most of the monk feats after 9 have little value unless you are going with a more-or-less pure monk, then in that case Diamond Soul has merit. 2 turns of 50% conceal (Empty Body) is almost as worthless as 20/+1 DR (Perfect Self) unless you can stack it somehow. Just some issues to consider...
